snippet: An admirer of Chinese contemporary artist Ai Weiwei and American pop-art master Andy Warhol, Milos Raonic is now trying to create his own portfolio of memorable work, albeit on a tennis court....
lead_paragraph: An admirer of Chinese contemporary artist Ai Weiwei and American pop-art master Andy Warhol, Milos Raonic is now trying to create his own portfolio of memorable work, albeit on a tennis court.

headline.print_headline: Raonic Looks at the Bigger Picture for Inspiration
headline.main: Raonic Looks at the Bigger Picture for Inspiration
